p: Chamomile ( Chamaemelum nobile) dried flowers and its essential oil have been used in food and cosmetics. It has also been used as treatment for fever, inflammation, muscle spasms, gastrointestinal disorders, rheumatic pain, hemorrhoids, and other pathologies ( 26). Among the psychological properties, it has been reported that Chamomile ( Chamaemelum nobile) has anxiolytic properties due to the presence of apigenin, which binds to central benzodiazepine receptors ( 27).
